in.basulabs.audiofocuscontroller

Interface AudioFocusController.OnAudioFocusChangeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    AudioFocusController

    public static interface AudioFocusController.OnAudioFocusChangeListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decreaseVolume()
      Duck the volume.
      void increaseVolume()
      Revive the volume to what it was before ducking.
      void pause()
      Pause the playback.
      void resume()
      Resume/start the playback.

    • Method Detail

      • decreaseVolume

        void decreaseVolume()
        Duck the volume.

        Will be called if and only if AudioFocusController.Builder.setPauseWhenAudioIsNoisy(boolean) is passed true.

      • increaseVolume

        void increaseVolume()
        Revive the volume to what it was before ducking.

        Will be called if and only if AudioFocusController.Builder.setPauseWhenAudioIsNoisy(boolean) is passed true.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause the playback.

      • resume

        void resume()
        Resume/start the playback.
